metadata.title: RHSA-2021:4324: python-psutil security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
psutil is a module providing an interface for retrieving information on all running processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network, users) in a portable way by using Python.

Security Fix(es):

* python-psutil: double free because of refcount mishandling (CVE-2019-18874)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.5 Release Notes linked from the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2019-18874 python-psutil: Double free because of refcount mishandling

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
python3-psutil is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
